item.description:
Hey Ladies and Gents -

New member Nicolas has requested a game night on December 19th.

I can't make it, but that doesn't stop you all from meeting. So have fun. Nicolas mentioned Settlers for a game and I know some of you have been really enjoying that one lately, so I am assuming that will get played.

SO please come, play, and forget there is only 5 more shopping days till Christmas after that.

Since I can not make it, I am foregoing the normal $1 suggested donation. Use that for a stocking stuffer, or if not a Christmas celebrated, I strongly suggest using it as a downpayment on a hot cup of coffee, tea, cocoa, etc......
item.name: Game Night at Nicolas' request
